title: Crossbow of Arcane Force
content:
ane Force Information

Arcane Ammunition: Infuse your crossbow bolts with arcane energy. Your ranged weapon attacks deal an additional 1D4 Force Damage. Range: 18 m

BG3 Crossbow of Arcane Force Location & Where to Find

Location: Crèche Y'llek Dropped by: Raider G'r'ath in Crèche Y'llek

Crossbow of Arcane Force Notes & Tips for BG3

Rarity: Uncommon Value: 130 Weight: 8.1
